timeline.bodyText: This is temporary to be able to build with SNAPSHOTs from source. Will be removed once all final versions are out.
timeline.author: radcortez

replies.bodyText: Is there a reason we can't release and use RC builds instead of snapshots? I really dislike the idea of snapshot dependencies in repositories. It makes the build unreliable and unreproducible between people.
replies.author: jmartisk

replies.bodyText: Basically I would say we could already release RC builds of all SmallRye projects (and also MP specs should there be any that don't have them yet) and merge them into the microprofile-4 branch, updating them to Final later..?
replies.author: jmartisk

replies.bodyText: Yes, this was before we had any MP spec release done and I was trying this out to check some early integration work. We can remove it now in favour of RCs.
replies.author: radcortez

replies.bodyText: Actually, we still need to keep it because of RESTEasy due to a incompatible change in Config that breaks all RESTEasy, but I can remove the rest.
replies.author: radcortez

timeline.bodyText: This is temporary to be able to use MP Config 2.0 Staging binaries. Will be removed once all final versions are out.
timeline.author: radcortez

timeline.bodyText: This is temporary to be able to build with SNAPSHOTs from source. Will be removed once all final versions are out.
timeline.author: radcortez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+configModelVersion: 3.0
+logToConsole: true
+verbosity: info
+repositories:
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.config:
+    includes:
+    - org.eclipse.microprofile.config
+    urls:
+    - git:https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-config
+    buildVersionPattern: 2.0
+    buildRef: tag-2.0
+    skipTests: true
+  io.smallrye.config:
+    includes:
+    - io.smallrye.config
+    urls:
+    - git:https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-config
+    buildVersionPattern: .*-SNAPSHOT
+    buildRef: branch-mpconfig20
+    skipTests: true
+  org.jboss.resteasy:
+    includes:
+    - org.jboss.resteasy
+    urls:
+    - git:https://github.com/radcortez/Resteasy
+    buildVersionPattern: .*-SNAPSHOT
+    buildRef: branch-4.6.0-SNAPSHOT-config-patched
+    skipTests: true
